body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Philip Jackson and I'm with Star Auto Group. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Cynthia. Could you provide your phone number so we can reach out to you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five - three two one - four one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you please confirm your address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three Oak Street, Cityville, Stateboro, Zipcode zero one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Cynthia. Is there anything else you can share with us about the issue you're experiencing with our product quality?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been noticing some inconsistencies in the car's performance which is making me nervous.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Cynthia. We will look into this matter promptly. Thank you for bringing it to our attention. We appreciate your time today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time and have a great day!
